roleset.name: incremental growth
roleset.note: RATCHET_UP-V NOTES: If ever is seen 'ratchet down' then this verb should not be phrasal,but rather the directional particle should be Arg5. (from ratchet.01-v)

example.name: quasi-nominal
example.text: But the 1989 fall total of 80, while well below 1988 activity, shows ``a steady ratcheting up in citizen referenda and initiatives,'' says Patrick McGuigan, editor of Family, Law and Democracy Report.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG4
example.text: They recently ratcheted it up from optional to important.
